item.title: CVE-2024-31922|2024-04-15T09:25:57.251Z -- Anton Aleksandrov -- WordPress Hosting Benchmark tool
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Anton Aleksandrov WordPress Hosting Benchmark tool.This issue affects WordPress Hosting Benchmark tool: from n/a through 1.3.6.
